item.title: Notes on Econometrics
item.description: Tests & Statistics \(R^2\) t-test F-test (Joint Test) J Test PE Test Chow (Breakpoint) Test Gauss-Markov Assumptions OLS Error Normality of \(ε\) Unbiasedness of \(s^2\) Consistency of \(s^2\) OLS Estimator Derive Normality of \(b\) Unbiasedness of \(b\) Consistent of \(b\) (Asymptotic) Efficienty BLUE (Best Linear Unbiased Estimator) CAN (Consistent and Asymptotically Normal) OLS Model Converge in Probability & Mean Square LLN (Law of Large Numbers) Interpretation Elasticity Regression Table IV (Instrument Variable) IV Estimator \(\hat{β}_{IV}\) GIVE (Generalized IV Estimator) Heteroskedasticity & Autocorrelation White (Hetero-Consistent) Standard Error HAC Standard Error Maximum Likelihood Model Compare Models Linear / Log & Interaction : F-stat OLS / GLS : Robust Standard Error Weird Models R Workout Data Generation OLS Regression Warning: under proofreading
